title: Champion selection bugged
body: Hello. I've just got the 28 min dodge penalty because of a bugg in champion selection. I found a match clicked the accept button and once I got into champ selection I couldn't see the champions nor could I use the chat or see any of the roles couldn't get a screenshot because I was trying to se if it might be a resolution problemwith my monitor but wasn't that. Also the patch update brought a connection failure everytime I get into a game i have to restart the client for my game to start loading.

replies.body:
Are you on the updated client?  This could be an issue with that or a network problem failing to keep you in sync during champion select.  Return to the legacy client and test it in a custom game to help rule out possibilities:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Let me know if that helps!

Went into the legacy client. It seems fixed now thanks. I wanted to let you guys know these problems just started today after the patch update. Might be just a coincidence but I know every information counts :)
